020import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
021import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
023import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.HandlerResponse;
026
027import java.util.Optional;
028
029/**
030 * PlayerCraftHandler
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 0.1.4.0
034 */
035public class ItemCraftHandler {
036
037  public HandlerResponse handle(final PlayerProvider provider, final AbstractItemStack<?> item) {
038
039    final Optional<Currency> currencyOptional = TNECore.eco().currency().findCurrencyByMaterial(item.material());
040    if(currencyOptional.isEmpty()) {
041
042      return new HandlerResponse("no currency found", false);
043    }
044
045    // && provider.hasPermission("tne.money.craft." + currencyOptional.get().getIdentifier())
046    if(provider == null) {
047
048      return new HandlerResponse("provider null or has permission override", false);
049    }
050
051    if(currencyOptional.get() instanceof final ItemCurrency itemCurrency) {
052
053      return new HandlerResponse("found, returning value", itemCurrency.blockCraft());
054    }
055
056    return new HandlerResponse("currency isn't item currency", false);
057  }
058}
